item.description:
Hi to All,

There will not be a meetup for January for the Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club. The next scheduled meetup will be held on February 2. I look forward to seeing everyone there then.

In the meantime, enjoy the holidays and warm wishes to all for a Happy, Healthy, Profitable and Awesome New Year!

Best regards,
Annie
item.how_to_find_us: Come in and go down the stairs to our meeting room on the lower level.
item.name: Canceling Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club January Meetup
